/*
Fix badge hover actions
*/
File _badge.scss 18
File /mixins/_badge.scss 5
FROM
  @at-root a#{&} {
TO:
  @at-root #{selector-unify(&, "a")} {


/*
Fix compile
*/
File _root.scss 5, 9
FROM
  --#{$color}: #{$value};
TO:
  #{--#{$color}}: #{$value};


/*
 & + & does not work with our wrapper setup
*/
File _list-group.scss 77
File _list-group-rtl.scss 77
FROM
  & + & {
TO:
  & + .list-group-item{
